Text: I have now uploaded 162GB which means I will no longer be seeding. For those who have already downloaded it please seed and comment on quality. It helps the community.
131 seeders and still no quality comments...

A:10 V:10 Hooked it from my labtop to my 46 inch and it looked just about perfect quality. The download gets a little slow sometimes, but if you truly like this series, I suggest you download this.. definitely worth the longer wait.

I previously downloaded the 4 gig torrent version of season 2 and quality of that one is downright terrible compared to this one.
Awesome torrent. Got this for my sister so she could catch up. I'm a stickler for imperfections and the video and audio were superb. Thank you!

Your welcome. Show your appreciation by seeding.

Also I hate that all those crap versions have more seeders then this proper version. Oh well though. People will take imperfection over size and time any day I guess.

They havn't even been released yet as far as I'm aware of. So be happy with what you got. Beats the TV versions uploaded on here.

Episodes 1-5 won't stream to my PS3...  Therefore we haven't watched this and won't for a while.  Can't comment on quality, but that one shortfall is a pain in the ass.

@Psychopuppy7 The ps3 isn't capable of decoding .MKV files. You could convert it to M2TS but then you have to worry about the audio as the PS3 also cannot decode certain audio types. Freemake video converter is what i use. Its has a PS3 setting which should get all the episodes working.
